verses.verse: <S%H2734>Don't<s%> fret because of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> neither be <S%H7065>envious<s%> against those who <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness.<s%>
For they shall <S%H4120>soon<s%> be cut <S%H5243>down<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> and <S%H5034>wither<s%> like the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%> <S%H7931>Dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7462>enjoy<s%> safe <S%H530>pasture.<s%>
Also <S%H6026>delight<s%> yourself in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4862>desires<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H982>Trust<s%> also in <S%H6213>him,<s%> and he will do this:
he will make your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as the <S%H216>light,<s%> and your <S%H4941>justice<s%> as the noon day <S%H6672>sun.<s%>

<S%H1826>Rest<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and wait <S%H2342>patiently<s%> for <S%H2734>him.<s%> Don't fret because of him who <S%H6743>prospers<s%> in his <S%H1870>way,<s%> because of the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> wicked <S%H4209>plots<s%> <S%H6213>happen.<s%>
<S%H7503>Cease<s%> from <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2534>wrath.<s%> <S%H2734>Don't<s%> fret, it <S%H389>leads<s%> only to <S%H7489>evildoing.<s%>
For <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> but those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
For yet a little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be no <S%H995>more.<s%> Yes, though you look for his <S%H4725>place,<s%> he isn't there.
But the <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H6026>delight<s%> themselves in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2161>plots<s%> against the <S%H6662>just,<s%> and <S%H2786>gnashes<s%> at him with his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H7200>him,<s%> for he sees that his <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>coming.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have drawn <S%H6605>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and have <S%H1869>bent<s%> their <S%H7198>bow,<s%> to cast <S%H5307>down<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H6041>needy,<s%> to <S%H2873>kill<s%> those who are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Their <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into their own <S%H3820>heart.<s%> Their <S%H7198>bows<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1995>has,<s%> than the abundance of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8549>perfect.<s%> Their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall be <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
They shall not be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%> In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7459>famine<s%> they shall be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%> The <S%H341>enemies<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be like the <S%H3368>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3733>fields.<s%> They will <S%H3615>vanish<s%>â€” <S%H3615>vanish<s%> like <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3867>borrow,<s%> and <S%H7999>don't<s%> pay back, but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2603>generously.<s%>
For such as are <S%H1288>blessed<s%> by him shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> Those who are <S%H7043>cursed<s%> by him shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
A <S%H1397>man<s%>'s <S%H4703>goings<s%> are <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He <S%H2654>delights<s%> in his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Though he <S%H5307>stumble,<s%> he shall not <S%H2904>fall,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5564>holds<s%> him up with his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

I have been <S%H5288>young,<s%> and now am <S%H2204>old,<s%> yet I have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> nor his <S%H2233>children<s%> <S%H1245>begging<s%> for <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
All day <S%H3117>long<s%> he deals <S%H2603>graciously,<s%> and <S%H3867>lends.<s%> His <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%> <S%H7931>Live<s%> securely <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H5800>doesn't<s%> forsake his <S%H2623>saints.<s%> They are <S%H8104>preserved<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> but the <S%H2233>children<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7931>live<s%> in it <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>talks<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> His <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1897>speaks<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%> None of his <S%H838>steps<s%> shall <S%H4571>slide.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6822>watches<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H1245>seeks<s%> to kill <S%H4191>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> him in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> nor <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him when he is <S%H8199>judged.<s%>

<S%H6960>Wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and he will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> you shall see <S%H7200>it.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in great <S%H6184>power,<s%> <S%H6168>spreading<s%> himself like a <S%H7488>green<s%> tree in its native <S%H249>soil.<s%>
But he passed <S%H5674>away,<s%> and <S%H1245>behold,<s%> he was not. Yes, I sought <S%H4672>him,<s%> but he could not be found.
<S%H8104>Mark<s%> the <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H7200>man,<s%> and see the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> for there is a <S%H319>future<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
As for <S%H6586>transgressors,<s%> they shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> The <S%H319>future<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
But the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He is their <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5826>helps<s%> <S%H6403>them,<s%> and rescues <S%H6403>them.<s%> He rescues them from the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H3467>saves<s%> <S%H2620>them,<s%> Because they have taken refuge in him.
